channel.title: Webclient error urgent rep ++
channel.description:
:)hello,mopars
i have a problem with the webclient if i want to use the webclient lava loads (fast) then there is error click for details if i click on it its says something about loader.class the html code is fine i think i jarred if fine cuz i can conect to it with my server but if my friend get the link he cant play and the error will show up picture of the error http://img225.imageshack.us/img225/3429/42045145.jpg
